https://tmrev.io/movie/260003-Crab Goalkeeper 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oXzMBqZKe1UAzLlYphKAOQMRyzI.jpg From Minoru Kawasaki, the director of "The Calamari Wrestler," "Executive Koala," "The Entire World Sinks Except Japan," and "The Rug Cop," comes the epic story of a giant crab who washes ashore, befriends a boy, finds love, and becomes a sports legend. The film has been described by Kawasaki as being 'like Forrest Gump...but with a crab.' Crab Goalkeeper
